item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "It doesn't matter who you are or what you look like, so long as somebody loves you." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "I have a passion for teaching kids to become readers, to become comfortable with a book, not daunted. Books shouldn't be daunting, they should be funny, exciting and wonderful; and learning to be a reader gives a terrific advantage." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Two rights don't equal a left." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "Everything in this room is edible. Even I'm edible. But, that would be called canibalism. It is looked down upon in most societies." -- Tim Burton

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "We have so much time and so little to do. Strike that, reverse it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Here it is,' Nigel said. Mrs D, Mrs I, Mrs FFI, Mrs C, Mrs U, Mrs LTY. That spells difficulty.' How perfectly ridiculous!' snorted Miss Trunchbull. 'Why are all these women married?" -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "I've heard tell that what you imagine sometimes comes true. -Grandpa Joe" -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Matilda said, "Never do anything by halves if you want to get away with it. Be outrageous. Go the whole hog. Make sure everything you do is so completely crazy it's unbelievable..." -- Roald Dahl
